info.description:
This is a sample Petstore server.  You can find
out more about Swagger at
[http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on
[irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).
info.title: Swagger Petstore

get.summary: Creates list of users with given input array

post.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

X-Rate-Limit.description: calls per hour allowed by the user

X-Expires-After.description: date in UTC when token expires

Set-Cookie.description: date in UTC when token expires

schema.description:
status map:
 * `1` - 未驗證
 * `2` - 已驗證

userStatus.description:
status map:
 * `1` - Verified
 * `2` - Unverified
 * `3` - WaitVerify
 * `4` - Locking
 * `9` - Test account 
 * `10` - Agent 
 * `11` - AgentLocking
